## DependencyGraphNode type

Represents a node in a dependency graph.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DependencyGraphNode = {
    $type?: string;
    Dependencies?: Array<DependencyGraphNode>;
    ExistsInContext?: boolean;
    HasMore?: boolean;
    Item?: IdentifiableObject;
};
```
